Creating an event in the Outlook calendar
The system allows
configuring a notification
to automatically create an event in the user’s Outlook calendar.
Sending a notification with calendar event creation is configured using the
sendMsgToSubject
,
sendMsgToEmail
and
getOrCreateCalEvent
functions when using the appropriate notification template.
In these functions, the template must be of the "Calendar notification" [SYS_CALENDAR_NOTIFY] type (or its child type).
The System will automatically create an "iCalendar event" [SYS_ICALENDAR_EVENT] object, which will allow the event to be displayed in the user’s Outlook calendar.
To create a notification template, sequentially select the menu items: Administration → Object management → Notification template.
In the opened registry, create an instance by clicking the
button on the control panel. The System will display a modal window where the "Calendar notification" type should be selected:
Configuring an instance of the "Calendar notification" [SYS_CALENDAR_NOTIFY] type involves specifying the following parameters:

Entering the notification template name.

Entering the notification template ID.

Template description of the event
Creating an event description template.
Sending a separate e-mail to each recipient
A boolean attribute that defines the generating of a single email for all users or a separate message for each. Possible values:
Yes – generating a separate letter for each recipient. For example, use the
recipientEmp
function;
No – generating a single letter for distribution to the entire group of users. In this case, using the recipientEmp function is not allowed (it will result in an error).
Signature
Selecting an algorithm that determines a signature added at the end of the letter.
The signature is added by the custom "Signature to the email notification" type [SYS_EMAIL_SIGNATURE].
Object parameters
Adding parameters of the used objects. Parameters are applied, for example, to configure filtering.
Algorithm for determining files to attach to an event
Selecting an algorithm that determines the files to be attached to the message.
Algorithm for determining the start date of an event
Selecting an algorithm that determines the start date of the event fixed in the Outlook calendar.

Algorithm for determining the end date of an event

When sending an email generated from a template (an instance of the "Calendar notification" type), an event will automatically appear in the Outlook calendar for all users included in the mailing. The initiator retains the ability to cancel the event.
